script.name: Menu.Anarkis.Pirate.Comm.Base.SM
script.description: Pirate Guild - Comm : Stations - Set Menu

line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled ACC debug menu. requires a bunch of menus to be included in ADS that are normally Player-only
* Put values, like value switch values and other init here
* The following commented block is for performance sensitive menus. Uncommenting calls the menu control write refresh only when UI control is manipulated.
* set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
* $st = sprintf: fmt='Debug : Check ADS Settings', null, null, null, null, null
* add custom dynamic menu item to array $Menu: text=$st return value='ads'
* None of these values are changed in this menu, but could be changed in a submenu, so don't accidentally overwrite those changes here.

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Comm : Stations - Set Menu
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled ACC debug menu. requires a bunch of menus to be included in ADS that are normally Player-only
Put values, like value switch values and other init here
The following commented block is for performance sensitive menus. Uncommenting calls the menu control write refresh only when UI control is manipulated.
set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
$st = sprintf: fmt='Debug : Check ADS Settings', null, null, null, null, null
add custom dynamic menu item to array $Menu: text=$st return value='ads'
None of these values are changed in this menu, but could be changed in a submenu, so don't accidentally overwrite those changes here.
